Contributor: Heyer, H. (Hermann), artist.; Victory Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "H. Heyer." Date based on date of Victory Liberty Loan Campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says that the government is teaching trades to the wounded men so they can get back on their feet again. Everyone should want to help them by buying Victory Liberty bonds. Illustration shows men instructing the wounded soldiers who have returned from the war. This is a design for a newspaper advertisement.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.
